2025-06-13ECCCFisheries ActRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations Regulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to add seven water bodies to Schedule 2 of the regulations designating them as tailings impoundment areas.Registration: SOR/2025-0138 Publication Date: 2025-07-02
subject: Regulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to add seven water bodies to Schedule 2 of the regulations designating them as tailings impoundment areas.
